roleset.name: manage

example.name: arb control, no object
example.text: [The foreign investment management departments and justice organizations]-1 insist on *trace*-1 administrating according to law and handling cases according to law , so that they have effectively protected rights and interests of each party .
example.arg: [The foreign investment management departments and justice organizations]-1

roleset.note: ADMINISTRATE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from administrate.01-v)
